Education

Consistently achieved the highest grades available across all levels of academia, with a Distinction in postgraduate studies, a First-Class Honours degree at undergraduate level, and 3 A*s at school. Undergraduate and postgraduate dissertations were both awarded 84%, with my undergraduate project ranking the highest in my class.

  • 2022.09 - 2024.08

    Edinburgh, UK

    MSc in Artificial Intelligence (Part-time)
    University of Edinburgh
    • Machine Learning (Pattern Recognition, RL, DL, Probabilistic ML)
    • Statistics (Bayesian Methods, Imputation)
  • 2017.10 - 2020.06

    Coventry, UK

    BSc in Data Science
    University of Warwick
    • Computer Science (OOP, Algorithms, Information Structures)
    • Machine Learning (Foundations)
    • Mathematics (Linear Algebra, Multivariate Calculus)
    • Probability (Foundations, Stochastic Modelling)
    • Statistics (Foundations, Frequentist Approaches, GLMs)

Work

  • 2023.10 - Present

    Edinburgh, UK

    Data Scientist (Part-time)
    FC Laboratories Limited
    A part-time role alongside postgraduate studies. Working on a contractual basis, having received two contract extensions.
  • 2023.01 - 2023.04

    Edinburgh, UK

    Python Developer (Part-time)
    Data Science Unit, School of Informatics, University of Edinburgh
    A part-time role alongside postgraduate studies. Streamlined the school's in-house Data Science Unit's research projects by creating a bespoke graph plotting library.
  • 2020.10 - 2022.07

    London, UK

    Decision Scientist
    Account Technologies
    Interacted with transactional, credit bureau, operational, financial, compliance, marketing, and customer data using Python to develop bespoke packages and the PyData stack to visualise data, train machine learning models, and report on business metrics.
  • 2019.07 - 2019.08

    London, UK

    Actuarial Intern
    Thomas Miller
    Assisted with programming, data analysis, and statistical modelling tasks for businesses within the Thomas Miller Group. The actuarial team at Thomas Miller was a combination of an in-house team and a consultancy; they provided actuarial services to over 15 companies within the Thomas Miller Group.
  • 2018.09 - 2018.09

    London, UK

    Natural Language Processing Intern
    Prudential Plc
    Supervised by the Head of Data Analytics within the Risk & Compliance department, completed independent project which aimed to gain insight into the FCA's news feed by applying methods of text analytics to a web-scraped corpus.

Volunteer

  • 2019.04 - 2020.04

    Coventry, UK

    1st XI Captain
    University of Warwick Men's Football Club
    Responsible for the day-to-day football-related operations of 4 teams (80 players) and led the 1st team on match days.
